sdkExtension.title: Design Studio SDK Extension by Karol provided by SCN

property.title: Connect To Common Messages
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE also the common Messages from messages popup will be handover to this notification bar

property.title: Split Notifications by Priority
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE the Notifications will be displayed in categories by priority

property.title: Show Notification Bar when New Notifications are Available
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE shows always Notification Bar when new Notifications are Available

property.title: Delete Notification when Clicked
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE deletes the Notification on click event

property.title: Remove All Notifications when Minimized
property.tooltip: Setting this to TRUE deletes all Notifications on minimize event
